_header: I will that the cock have the quede / And for his song he shall be dead
_description: A couplet in the Gesta Romanorum

BLAdd9066.Transcription:
I wille that the cock have the quedeand for his songe he shall be
                    dede
BLAdd9066.Editions:
Madden,  Frederick. 
             The Old English Versions of the Gesta Romanorum.
Roxburghe Club.
         55. London: Nicol, 1838: 308.
